title: Did Superintendent Arizona Kathy Hoffman pay for sex in kindergarten?
subtitle: The general education supervisor in Arizona was the target of several humiliating allegations made in the Facebook viral publication.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Director of Public Education of Arizona, Kathy Hoffman, called for students to be taught about "to masturbation and sexual office" after she took an oath of office with her hand in Dr. Seus' book.
